dos/config.h was generated with autoheader, which tells Autoconf to output a script to generate a config.h file and then runs it.

The gettext-runtime package is under the LGPL, see files intl/COPYING.LIB-2.0 and intl/COPYING.LIB-2.1.
The complete text of intl/COPYING.LIB-2.0 from gettext-runtime 0.12 can be found at
https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.0.txt
and the text of intl/COPYING.LIB-2.1 can be found at
https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.txt
po/Makevars consists mostly of helpful comments and does not contain a copyright and license notice.
